name: Heckpoint
description: Heckpoint is a frenetic side-scrolling shoot 'em up where everything and everyone is destructible (especially you). Explore seven worlds as any of 12 characters, each with a unique backstory and abilities. Collect strange matter to upgrade and unlock over 70 weapons and powers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium Dual Core 2 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD (onboard) or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any
